Test.Name: Association
Test.Description: performs association with a user defined Access Point

ARGUMENT.name: -stay_assoc
ARGUMENT.Description: When the test is done, the Nic will be disconnected. Use [-stay_assoc] to stay associated

ARGUMENT.name: -ant_isolation
ARGUMENT.Description: Shows the physical isolation between two antennas when Wi-Fi is associated to AP and BT is active. Antenna isolation value is in dB.

ARGUMENT.name: -delay
ARGUMENT.Description: Sets delay, in msec between changing band/diversity/11n mode parameters and starting association. Default value is 1 msec.

ARGUMENT.name: -aggressive
ARGUMENT.Description: Sends association requests once every 2 seconds until association succeeds or time out expires.

ARGUMENT.name: -d
ARGUMENT.Description: Extracts logs to ‘antToolLog.log’. Overwrite will delete all file content

ARGUMENT.name: -debug
ARGUMENT.Description: Extracts logs to ‘antToolLog.log’. Overwrite will delete all file content

ERRORCODE.Reason: ANT was able to associate with AP
ANT was unable to associate with AP
ERRORCODE.Action: Verify SSID is correct and the antennas connectivity
Verify appropriate driver installed, device connected

Test.Name: RSSI Test
Test.Description: performs association with a user defined Access Point and executes the RSSI test

ARGUMENT.name: -antd
ARGUMENT.Description: Test RSSI on chain with the highest RSSI

ARGUMENT.name: -ant_all
ARGUMENT.Description: Test RSSI on all supported chains

ARGUMENT.name: -stay_assoc
ARGUMENT.Description: When the test is done, the Nic will be disconnected. Use [-stay_assoc] to stay associated

ARGUMENT.name: -rssi_loops
ARGUMENT.Description: Number of RSSI measurements per test iteration

ARGUMENT.name: -falloff
ARGUMENT.Description: Sets fall off parameter of waiting for stable RSSI. This is the weight ratio of accumulated RSSI compared to weight of current RSSI when waiting for a stable RSSI.

ARGUMENT.name: -stable_rssi_threshold
ARGUMENT.Description: Sets threshold for the diff between current RSSI and average RSSI when waiting for stable RSSI.

ARGUMENT.name: -ant_isolation
ARGUMENT.Description: Shows the physical isolation between two antennas when Wi-Fi is associated to AP and BT is active. Antenna isolation value is in dB.

ARGUMENT.name: -delay
ARGUMENT.Description: Sets delay, in msec between changing band/diversity/11n mode parameters and starting association. Default value is 1 msec.

ARGUMENT.name: -aggressive
ARGUMENT.Description: Sends association requests once every 2 seconds until association succeeds or time out expires.

ARGUMENT.name: -xml
ARGUMENT.Description: writes test results to an XML file, either appending or overwriting

ARGUMENT.name: -d
ARGUMENT.Description: Extracts logs to ‘antToolLog.log’. Overwrite will delete all file content

ARGUMENT.name: -debug
ARGUMENT.Description: Extracts logs to ‘antToolLog.log’. Overwrite will delete all file content
